fields.name: Arabic Calligraphy – Bismillah Canvas
fields.description: Hand-crafted Arabic calligraphy featuring 'Bismillah' in elegant Thuluth style. Printed on premium cotton canvas, perfect for modern and traditional interiors.

fields.name: Japanese Shodō – Harmony (和) Print
fields.description: Minimalist Japanese Shodō artwork symbolizing harmony (和). Inspired by Zen philosophy and brushed using traditional sumi ink.

fields.name: Modern English Calligraphy Quote Print
fields.description: Contemporary English calligraphy featuring an inspirational quote. Perfect for offices, studios, and creative spaces.

fields.name: Premium Bamboo Calligraphy Brush Set
fields.description: Set of 3 handcrafted bamboo brushes suitable for Arabic, Japanese, and modern calligraphy styles.

fields.name: Traditional Sumi Ink Stick
fields.description: Authentic Japanese sumi ink stick made for deep blacks and smooth brush flow. Ideal for professional calligraphy work.

fields.name: Handmade Calligraphy Practice Paper Pad
fields.description: High-absorbency paper pad designed specifically for ink and brush control. Suitable for beginners and professionals.

fields.name: Limited Edition Calligraphy Art Print
fields.description: Museum-quality giclée print of an original multilingual calligraphy composition (Arabic, English, Japanese).

fields.name: Original Handwritten Calligraphy Artwork
fields.description: One-of-a-kind original calligraphy artwork created by a master calligrapher. Signed and authenticated.

fields.name: Beginner Calligraphy Starter Kit
fields.description: All-in-one starter kit including brushes, ink, practice paper, and a beginner’s guide to calligraphy.

fields.name: Advanced Multilingual Calligraphy Kit
fields.description: Professional-grade kit for Arabic, English, and Japanese calligraphy enthusiasts. Includes premium tools and inks.
